      • initialConfig

        public static java.sql.Connection initialConfig​(long serverNumber)
        creates database and adds all the tables neccessaries for the program to run
        Parameters:
        serverNumber - identifier of the multicast server
        Returns:
        the connection to database in case of success, false otherwise

      • enterFileInTable

        public static boolean enterFileInTable​(java.lang.String table,
                                       java.lang.String column,
                                       java.lang.String fileLocation,
                                       int id)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        add one file to one table (can be albums for picture, cloudmusics for music file, musics for lyrics)
        Parameters:
        table - can be cloudmusics, albums, musics
        column - can be musicfile, picture, lyrics
        fileLocation - where the file is located
        id - albumID, musicID
        Returns:
        true in success, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • enterArrayInTable

        public static void enterArrayInTable​(java.lang.String table,
                                     byte[] array,
                                     int id,
                                     java.lang.String username)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        add array of bytes, for upload music to database and other files
        Parameters:
        table - of the table to store the array, cloudmusics, for example in case of musics
        array - the array of bytes that has the data
        id - musicID in case of cloudmusics
        username - to associate the file ot username
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                                     int id,
                                     java.lang.String username)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        get array data from table to download file from database (multicast server)
        Parameters:
        table - where the array with data is cloudmusics
        id - musicID associated with the file
        username - of the user that has the file
        Returns:
        the array of bytes with file's data
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                          throws java.sql.SQLException

        newName - the new name for the column
        ID - of the data you want to change the name, artistID, albumID, musicID
        column - name (or description in case of album)
        Returns:
        false, no verification yet
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getUserNotifications

        public static java.lang.String getUserNotifications​(java.lang.String username)
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        get notifications in the database notifications of one user (while he was offline)
        Parameters:
        username - of the user you want to search the notifications he has
        Returns:
        string containing the notifications or "no notifications while you were offline" if user hasn't notifications
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
